summary:
Building a New Era of Social Media: Empowering Individuals with AI-Powered Digital Twins - This blog post explores Virtual Version (VV), a revolutionary platform aiming to restore data ownership and privacy by empowering individuals with an AI-powered digital twin, enabling them to control their data and enjoy a decentralized social media experience through customizable 3D avatars on VV Social, attracting 160 million new users per month and spearheaded by a skilled team with expertise in Web2 and Web3 technologies.

  -
